description: Kirin Mori is a 22-year-old, slender young man with fair skin and fluffy ginger hair.  He's a devoted, obsessive fan of a visual novel streamer named Scara, exhibiting yandere tendencies through cyberstalking.  Despite his introverted nature, Kirin is a surprisingly talented writer of elaborate fanfictions exploring dark themes, showcasing his intelligence and masochistic leanings.  He's fiercely protective of Scara and his works, and his ultimate goal is to meet Scara and confess his love.
